data.comment: The big names in today's match at Volgograd Arena have now been confirmed.
The first-half is just kicking off.
In the minute 1, Ural Yekaterinburg to take a throw-in in Volgograd territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Volgograd at Volgograd Arena.
In the minute 2, Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Volgograd.
Can Ural Yekaterinburg capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Volgograd needs to be cautious. Ural Yekaterinburg have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 4, Goal kick for Volgograd at Volgograd Arena.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a Volgograd throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half.
Oleg Aleynik for Volgograd drives towards goal at Volgograd Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 9, Ural Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Vladimir Moskalev.
Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Volgograd to check on Oleg Aleynik, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 11, Volgograd drive forward but Flamarion is judged offside.
Volgograd pushes forward through Zurab Davitashvili, whose finish on goal is saved.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
In the minute 14, Volgograd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Ural Yekaterinburg goal kick.
In the minute 17, Throw-in Volgograd.
Oleg Aleynik is back on his feet again.
Volgograd's Cedric Gogoua is back in action after a slight knock.
Cedric Gogoua is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 18, Vladimir Moskalev awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Ural Yekaterinburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Volgograd's half?
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Volgograd.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Volgograd close to the penalty box.
Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Volgograd.
In the minute 23, Ural Yekaterinburg surge into the attack at Volgograd Arena but Pogrebnyak Pavelâ€™s header is off-target.
Vladimir Moskalev awards Volgograd a goal kick.
Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, Corner awarded to Volgograd.
Kamil Mullin's header is off-target for Volgograd.
Ural Yekaterinburg have a goal kick.
In the minute 27, In Volgograd a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Can Ural Yekaterinburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Volgograd's half?
Ural Yekaterinburg's Othman El Kabir is whistled for offside at Volgograd Arena.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
Eric Bicfalvi (Ural Yekaterinburg) has received a yellow card from Vladimir Moskalev.
Throw-in for Volgograd in their own half.
In the minute 30, Free kick Ural Yekaterinburg.
Free kick Ural Yekaterinburg.
Free kick in a good position for Ural Yekaterinburg!
In the minute 32, At Volgograd Arena, Danil Stepanov has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Othman El Kabir of Ural Yekaterinburg smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Volgograd.
In the minute 35, Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Volgograd.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
In the minute 36, Ural Yekaterinburg's Othman El Kabir gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Volgograd.
At Volgograd Arena, Oleg Kozhemyakin for the home team has been yellow-carded. He will miss the next match due to a suspension!
In Volgograd a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 38, Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
Volgograd have a dangerous throw-in.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a Volgograd throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half.
In the minute 39, Zurab Davitashvili of Volgograd gets in a strike, but is off target.
Kamil Mullin of Volgograd is pulled up for offside.
Ural Yekaterinburg's Igor Kalinin breaks free at Volgograd Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 42, Goal kick for Volgograd at Volgograd Arena.
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Volgograd.
Igor Kalinin (Ural Yekaterinburg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Volgograd.
Throw-in high up the field for Ural Yekaterinburg in Volgograd.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Ural Yekaterinburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Volgograd Arena.
In the minute 47, Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Ural Yekaterinburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Volgograd's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Volgograd.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Volgograd.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 53, Flamarion for Volgograd is back on the field again.
Flamarion is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Ural Yekaterinburg to take a throw-in in Volgograd territory.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Volgograd.
Branko Jovicic (Ural Yekaterinburg) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
Ball safe as Ural Yekaterinburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Kamil Mullin gets his shot on target but fails to score for Volgograd.
Throw-in Volgograd.
In the minute 59, Ural Yekaterinburg to take a throw-in in Volgograd territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ural Yekaterinburg have a goal kick.
In the minute 61, Othman El Kabir for Ural Yekaterinburg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Volgograd goal kick.
Volgograd will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 62, Zurab Davitashvili (Volgograd) gets a yellow card.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Volgograd just outside Ural Yekaterinburg's area.
Vladimir Moskalev awards Ural Yekaterinburg a goal kick.
In the minute 66, Volgograd make their first substitution with Sergey Serchenkov replacing Zurab Davitashvili.
The away team have replaced Dmitri Efremov with Vyacheslav Podberezkin. This is the first substitution made today by Yuriy Matveev.
Can Volgograd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half?
In the minute 68, Vladimir Moskalev awards the away team a throw-in.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a Ural Yekaterinburg throw-in in Volgograd's half.
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 68, Vladimir Moskalev signals a Volgograd throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half.
In Volgograd a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Volgograd are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Volgograd in their own half.
Free kick Volgograd.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg at Volgograd Arena.
Beka Mikeltadze is replacing Kamil Mullin for Volgograd at Volgograd Arena.
Corner awarded to Volgograd.
Volgograd are pushing forward but Beka Mikeltadze's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 76, Ball goes out of play for a Ural Yekaterinburg goal kick.
Andrey Panyukov is replacing Pogrebnyak Pavel for the away team.
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Volgograd.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg, close to Volgograd's area.
In the minute 78, Ilya Zhigulev is booked for the home team and will be suspended from the next match.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Volgograd.
Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Volgograd at Volgograd Arena.
In the minute 82, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Ural Yekaterinburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Volgograd's half?
In the minute 83, Ural Yekaterinburg push upfield and Andrey Panyukov gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Volgograd defence.
Yuriy Matveev (Ural Yekaterinburg) is making a third substitution, with Artem Shabolin replacing Othman El Kabir.
Throw-in for Volgograd in their own half.
Great shot from Ural Yekaterinburg's Andrey Panyukov but he is denied by the crossbar.
In the minute 85, Volgograd drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Ural Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Vladimir Moskalev.
Volgograd to take a throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg territory.
In the minute 86, Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Vladimir Moskalev awards the away team a throw-in.
Ural Yekaterinburg to take a throw-in in Volgograd territory.
In the minute 89, Volgograd needs to be cautious. Ural Yekaterinburg have an attacking throw-in.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
In Volgograd, Eric Bicfalvi of Ural Yekaterinburg is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ural Yekaterinburg's Danijel Miskic misses with an attempt on goal.
Vladimir Moskalev awards Volgograd a goal kick.
That's full-time at Volgograd Arena. The final score is 0-0.
Rafal Augustyniak for Ural Yekaterinburg has been booked by Vladimir Moskalev and receives a first yellow card.
